Major_Arcs.title: Circus Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus setting and various characters' initial encounters with it.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Strongman Act
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Paul Bunyan as a circus performer.

sub_scenes.title: Man Hears About the Circus
sub_scenes.description: A man learns about the circus coming to town and decides to visit.

narrative_arcs.title: Man Hears News of the Circus

sub_scenes.title: Family at the Giraffe Exhibit
sub_scenes.description: A family's reaction to seeing a giraffe at the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Family Reacts to Giraffe at Circus

Major_Arcs.title: Tent Confrontation and Paul Bunyan Reveal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the man in the checkered shirt's investigation of trouble in a tent, leading to a fight and the revelation of his identity.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation of Trouble
sub_scenes.description: The man in the checkered shirt investigates sounds of trouble from a tent.

sub_scenes.title: Show of Strength
sub_scenes.description: The man in the checkered shirt demonstrates unexpected strength by defeating aggressors.

sub_scenes.title: Identity Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The man in the checkered shirt reveals himself to be Paul Bunyan after being shot.

narrative_arcs.title: Pistol Threat and Revelation of Identity

Major_Arcs.title: Job Offer at the Circus
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the aftermath of the fight and the circus owner's proposition for Paul Bunyan to join their circus.

sub_scenes.title: Gratitude and Backstory
sub_scenes.description: The circus owner expresses gratitude and explains the conflict with Matto Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude and Revelation of Past Conflict

sub_scenes.title: The Strongman Proposal
sub_scenes.description: The circus owner offers Paul Bunyan the position of strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Considering the Offer
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan contemplates the offer.

Major_Arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Attempt - Fire
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Matto Grasso's first attempt at revenge through arson and Paul Bunyan's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Debut and Grasso's Envy
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan debuts as a strongman, and Matto Grasso becomes envious and plots revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Debut and Matto Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Arsonous Plan
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso prepares to set the circus tent on fire.

sub_scenes.title: Tent Fire and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Fire breaks out, and Paul Bunyan quickly puts it out.

narrative_arcs.title: Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action

Major_Arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Attempt - Ape Release
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Matto Grasso's second attempt at revenge by releasing an ape and Paul Bunyan's intervention again.

sub_scenes.title: New Scheme - Ape Release
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso expresses frustration and decides to release a baby ape.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Frustration and a New Scheme

sub_scenes.title: Ape Release and Paul's Stop
sub_scenes.description: The ape is released, but Paul Bunyan intervenes to stop it.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ape's Release and Paul's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Chasing the Releaser
sub_scenes.description: A circus worker chases the person responsible for releasing the ape.

Major_Arcs.title: Arena Chase and Failed Attempts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes the chase of the ape releaser through the circus arena and his unsuccessful attempts to evade capture.

sub_scenes.title: Arena Entry and Interception Plan
sub_scenes.description: The ape releaser runs towards the arena, and someone plans to intercept him.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and a New Plan

sub_scenes.title: Weightlifting Mishap
sub_scenes.description: The ape releaser tries to use a barbell as a weapon but fails.

sub_scenes.title: Hat Trick Evasion
sub_scenes.description: The ape releaser attempts a hat trick to escape but continues to be chased.

narrative_arcs.title: The Hat Trick and Continued Escape

Major_Arcs.title: Impromptu Circus Fight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts an unscheduled fight breaking out in the circus arena, witnessed by onlookers.

sub_scenes.title: Challenge and Scuffle
sub_scenes.description: A larger man challenges a smaller man to a fight.

sub_scenes.title: Spectator Observation
sub_scenes.description: Onlookers are surprised and intrigued by the unexpected fight.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Threat
sub_scenes.description: The larger man threatens to throw the smaller man onto the trapeze bar.

Major_Arcs.title: Circus Fight Resolution and Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the impromptu fight and shows Paul Bunyan rejecting a job offer and leaving the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan throws his opponent onto the trapeze bar, and the audience applauds.

sub_scenes.title: Offer of Strongman Position
sub_scenes.description: Authority figures offer Paul Bunyan the strongman position.

sub_scenes.title: Rejection and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan rejects the offer and decides to return to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and Severed Head - New Stories Start
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc begins two separate, new storylines on page 9, one about Marco Polo and another about a severed head.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Marco Polo's past adventure with the Awful Ogress of Tibet.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Awful Ogress of Tibet

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback discovers a talking severed head in a forest.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo in Hi-Toun
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's encounter with an old man and his arrival in the city of Hi-Toun.

sub_scenes.title: Gratitude and Guidance
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo helps an old man who offers him a dagger and directions.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude and Guidance from the Old Man

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives at Hi-Toun and finds the city in mourning.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus Quest Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates Marco Polo's quest to find the missing Princess Lotus in Hi-Toun.

sub_scenes.title: Welcome and Trouble in Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is welcomed by the King of Hi-Toun who mentions trouble.

sub_scenes.title: King's Grief - Lotus Disappearance
sub_scenes.description: The King explains his grief over his daughter Princess Lotus's disappearance.

narrative_arcs.title: The King's Grief Over Daughter Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Starving Woman and Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo encounters a starving woman and is led to an ominous, castle-like house.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with a Starving Woman and the Witch's Castle

Major_Arcs.title: Ogress's Castle Trap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's entry into the mysterious castle and his entrapment by the Ogress of Tibet.

sub_scenes.title: Mysterious Castle and 'Children'
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo enters the castle and is presented with mice as 'children'.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Meeting the 'Children'

sub_scenes.title: Imprisonment and Ogress Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is declared a 'guest' and the woman reveals herself as the Ogress of Tibet.

narrative_arcs.title: Imprisonment as a 'Guest' and Ogress Revelation

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Ogress
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo faces the Ogress and her tusked mice, preparing for a fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Tusked Mice and Ogress's Claws

Major_Arcs.title: Snake Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a man's attempt to escape and his subsequent capture using snakes.

sub_scenes.title: Fire Attack and Escape Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked figure attacks with fire, and the man tries to escape using smoke.

sub_scenes.title: Wrist Entrapment
sub_scenes.description: Snakes are used to bind the man's wrists.

sub_scenes.title: Ankle Entrapment and Gloating
sub_scenes.description: Snakes bind the ankles, and the cloaked figure gloats.

Major_Arcs.title: Ogress Escape with Knife
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes captives using a hidden knife to escape the Old Woman Ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Threat of Being Eaten
sub_scenes.description: Captives are held by an old woman who threatens to eat them.

sub_scenes.title: Hidden Knife Discovery
sub_scenes.description: A captive remembers a hidden knife.

sub_scenes.title: Knife Attack Success
sub_scenes.description: The captive uses the knife to attack the returning old woman.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unexpected Attack and Its Success

Major_Arcs.title: Reunion and Reward
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the story of the escaped captives, showing their reunion with the woman's father and the young man's reward.

sub_scenes.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey Home
sub_scenes.description: The captives escape the dungeon and journey to the woman's father.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father

sub_scenes.title: Cheerful Mourning Arrival
sub_scenes.description: They arrive at the father's place and encounter cheerful mourning customs.

sub_scenes.title: Father's Joy and Reward
sub_scenes.description: The father is overjoyed, offers reward, and the young man chooses the magic knife.

Major_Arcs.title: Treasure Story Begins - Penal Colony
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a new story about treasure, starting with a prologue and setting in a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper Prologue
sub_scenes.description: A Treasure Keeper presents a scroll setting up a treasure tale.

sub_scenes.title: Penal Colony Setting
sub_scenes.description: Setting in a British penal colony, routine and officer's request.

narrative_arcs.title: Penal Colony Routine and Officer's Request

Major_Arcs.title: Treasure Deal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes a prisoner's deal with Captain Brooking involving buried treasure in exchange for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Plea and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner pleads with Captain Brooking but is initially rejected.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Lure
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner offers treasure, and Captain Brooking becomes intrigued.

sub_scenes.title: Agreement for Escape
sub_scenes.description: Captain Brooking agrees to help the prisoner escape in exchange for treasure.

Major_Arcs.title: Betrayal and Revenge Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Captain Brooking's betrayal and Joseph Jordan's vow for revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal Realization
sub_scenes.description: Joseph Jordan realizes Captain Brooking has betrayed him and taken the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Years Pass - Vengeance Endures
sub_scenes.description: Years later, Joseph Jordan is released but still seeks revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Years Later - Freedom and Undying Vengeance

Major_Arcs.title: Brooking Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes Joseph Jordan's confrontation with Captain Brooking in England.

sub_scenes.title: Vigil and Brooking's Exit
sub_scenes.description: Joseph Jordan watches Brooking's house, and Brooking emerges.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Invitation
sub_scenes.description: Jordan confronts Brooking, who deceptively invites him home.

Major_Arcs.title: Attic Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a betrayal and murder that takes place in an attic over treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Reveal in Attic
sub_scenes.description: Men go to the attic where treasure is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Betrayal is revealed, and an attack ensues.

sub_scenes.title: Execution
sub_scenes.description: The man in white is murdered in the attic.

Major_Arcs.title: Police Investigation and Moral
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the police investigation of the attic murder and a concluding moral reflection.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Police investigate after hearing a gunshot and discover a body.

sub_scenes.title: Escape of Suspect
sub_scenes.description: The suspect confronts police and escapes by jumping out a window.

sub_scenes.title: Homicide Squad and Analysis
sub_scenes.description: Police analyze the scene and call the homicide squad.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: An old man delivers a moral about treasure and evil.

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and Courtroom Drama - New Story Start
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc begins a new storyline involving Dr. Styx and a courtroom drama.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx is shown threatening a woman.

sub_scenes.title: Courtroom Sentencing
sub_scenes.description: A man is sentenced in court, and there's an angry outburst.

Major_Arcs.title: Haunted House Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sets up a story about a haunted estate and the arrival of investigators.

sub_scenes.title: Discussion about Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup and Dr. Styx discuss the haunted Matthews estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Matthews' Estate and Haunting

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Matthews Place
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup arrives at Matthews Place at night.

sub_scenes.title: Alvin's Warning
sub_scenes.description: Alvin warns Mr. Northrup about the evil and haunting in the house.

Major_Arcs.title: First Ghost Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes Mr. Northrup's entry into the haunted house and his first confrontation with Vincent Matthews' ghost.

sub_scenes.title: Ignoring Warning and Entry
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup ignores Alvin's warning and enters the haunted house alone.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring Alvin's Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Encounter and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup encounters a ghost who reveals himself as Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Threats
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup and Vincent Matthews' ghost exchange threats.

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Fight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the physical confrontation between Mr. Northrup and Vincent Matthews' ghost.

sub_scenes.title: Challenge and Initial Clash
sub_scenes.description: The ghost challenges Mr. Northrup, and they begin to fight.

sub_scenes.title: Ghost's Attack and Capture
sub_scenes.description: The ghost attacks and captures Mr. Northrup.

sub_scenes.title: Overpowering the Ghost
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup unexpectedly overpowers the ghost.

Major_Arcs.title: Salvation Dialogue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to dialogue about violence, fear, and a path to salvation involving forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning Violence
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup questions the effectiveness of violence.

sub_scenes.title: Salvation Advice
sub_scenes.description: The ghost advises on salvation through forgiveness and love.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Guidance and Receiving Advice on Salvation

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind as Key
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind is revealed as the key to Mr. Northrup's salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Rosalind as the Key to Salvation

Major_Arcs.title: Rosalind Summoning
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the forced confrontation and summoning of Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: A figure forces another to face 'her'.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Confrontation and Accusation of Cowardice

sub_scenes.title: Physical Restraint
sub_scenes.description: Physical restraint and assertion of superior strength.

narrative_arcs.title: Physical Restraint and Assertion of Superior Strength

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind's Apparition
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind is summoned and appears as an apparition.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosalind's Forgiveness and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Rosalind's forgiveness and the resolution of the conflict through brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Identification
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind identifies her destroyer.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation and Identification of the Destroyer

sub_scenes.title: Request for Rest
sub_scenes.description: A favor is requested from Rosalind: to permit rest.

narrative_arcs.title: Request for a Favor: Permitting Rest

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness Declaration
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind declares forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Brotherly Love Needed
sub_scenes.description: Brotherly love is declared more important than forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Acceptance and Release
sub_scenes.description: Brotherly love is accepted, and release occurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Acceptance of Brotherly Love and Release

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Story Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the ghost story with remorse, farewell, and explanation.

sub_scenes.title: Remorse and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: Vincent expresses remorse, and Rosalind offers ultimate forgiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Vincent's Remorse and Rosalind's Ultimate Forgiveness

sub_scenes.title: Spectral Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Vincent and Rosalind depart as spirits.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Shelter and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: The figure in red and black seeks shelter and provides an explanation.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's First Voyage - Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the historical context of Henry Hudson's first voyage to find the Northwest Passage.

sub_scenes.title: Fate of Henry Hudson Intro
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the mysterious fate of Henry Hudson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Voyage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Proposal to Captain Hudson for a voyage to find the Northwest Passage.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's First Voyage - Journey and Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Henry Hudson's first voyage, the crew's discontent, and their eventual return to Holland.

sub_scenes.title: Crew Discontent
sub_scenes.description: Growing crew discontent and demand to turn south.

narrative_arcs.title: Growing Discontent and Demand to Turn South

sub_scenes.title: Hudson River False Hope
sub_scenes.description: Entering the Hudson River and the realization it's not the passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River and False Hope

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Hudson decides to resign and return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Return to Holland
sub_scenes.description: The Half Moon returns to Holland.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Second Voyage - Setup and Icy Start
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sets up Henry Hudson's second voyage and the immediate challenge of icy conditions.

sub_scenes.title: Second Expedition and Ice
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's second expedition and the ship getting stuck in ice.

narrative_arcs.title: Hudson's Second Expedition and Icy Route

sub_scenes.title: Voyage Resumption and Grievances
sub_scenes.description: Voyage resumes after winter, but crew grievances grow.

narrative_arcs.title: Resumption of Voyage and Crew's Grievances

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Second Voyage - Mutiny and Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the mutiny against Henry Hudson, his abandonment, and the mutineers' fate.

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny Eruption
sub_scenes.description: Mutiny erupts against Captain Hudson.

sub_scenes.title: Hudson Set Adrift
sub_scenes.description: Captain Hudson and loyalists are set adrift.

sub_scenes.title: Mutineers' Justice
sub_scenes.description: Mutineers return home and face justice.

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight Mission Begins - Chase and Briefing
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Arabian Knight and his mission to rescue a kidnapped woman.

sub_scenes.title: Opening Chase Scene
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Arabian Knight in a chase scene.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight Introduction and Chase

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing by Caliph
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight is summoned by the Caliph and briefed on his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph and The Mission Briefing

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight's Journey - Setting Off and Oasis Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the Arabian Knight setting off on his mission and his encounters at an oasis.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Departure
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight sets off on his rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Deserted Oasis
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight arrives at a deserted oasis and finds Tartar tracks.

narrative_arcs.title: The Deserted Oasis and Tracking the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Traveler's Warning
sub_scenes.description: Encounter with a traveler who warns of danger ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter and Warning from a Traveler

sub_scenes.title: Revealing Rescue Purpose
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight reveals his rescue mission to the traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Revealing the Rescue and Parting Ways

Major_Arcs.title: Infiltrating Tartar Camp
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the Arabian Knight's infiltration into the Tartar camp.

sub_scenes.title: Camp Outskirts Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight reaches the outskirts of the Tartar camp.

sub_scenes.title: Vigilant Sentry Observation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of a vigilant Tartar sentry.

sub_scenes.title: Sentry Assault
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight assaults the sentry.

sub_scenes.title: Disguise Plan
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight plans to use disguise for infiltration.

sub_scenes.title: Inside Camp Search
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight is inside the Tartar camp and begins to search.

sub_scenes.title: Eavesdropping for Information
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight eavesdrops on Tartar conversation to find the captive.

Major_Arcs.title: Contact and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Arabian Knight making contact with the captive and his subsequent capture.

sub_scenes.title: Reaching Out to Captive
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight reaches out to the captive in a tent.

sub_scenes.title: Guard Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Tartar guards discover Arabian Knight near the tent.

sub_scenes.title: Capture by Tartars
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight is captured by Tartar guards.

Major_Arcs.title: Trial by Combat Agreement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Arabian Knight's confrontation with Kurgan and the agreement for a trial by combat.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight is brought before Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan proposes a trial by combat.

sub_scenes.title: Negotiating Terms
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight negotiates the terms of victory.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Agreement
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan conditionally agrees to the terms.

sub_scenes.title: Acceptance and Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight accepts the challenge with determination.

sub_scenes.title: Focused Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight focuses his resolve before the fight.

Major_Arcs.title: Trial by Combat Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc starts the trial by combat, showing the signal and Arabian Knight's strategy.

sub_scenes.title: Combat Signal
sub_scenes.description: Signal is given to commence the trial by combat.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Strategy Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight reveals his unconventional strategy.

sub_scenes.title: Blinding Strike and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight uses dirt for a blinding strike and continues assault.

Major_Arcs.title: Trial by Combat Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the trial by combat, showing Arabian Knight's victory and Kurgan's response.

sub_scenes.title: Barbarian Counter Attack
sub_scenes.description: Barbarian fighters launch a counter-attack.

sub_scenes.title: Decisive Takedown
sub_scenes.description: Arabian Knight achieves a decisive takedown.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan Grants Safe Passage
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan recognizes Arabian Knight's valor and grants safe passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan's Recognition and Grant of Safe Passage

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight Story Conclusion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Arabian Knight's story with parting words, recognition, and a romantic farewell.

sub_scenes.title: Noble Recognition and Parting
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan acknowledges Arabian Knight's nobility as they part ways.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning Affection
sub_scenes.description: The woman questions Arabian Knight about his feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Affectionate Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Journey's end with an affectionate farewell kiss.
